# Algorithms for Quantitative Pedology (aqp) package for R

[![aqp hexsticker (Paxton, Montauk, Woodbridge, Ridgebury, Whitman,
Catden soil series
dendogram)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ncss-tech/aqp/master/misc/hexstickers/aqp_sticker_v2.png "aqp hexsticker (Paxton, Montauk, Woodbridge, Ridgebury, Whitman, Catden soil series dendogram)")](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ncss-tech/aqp/master/misc/hexstickers/aqp_sticker_v2.png)

The Algorithms for Quantitative Pedology (AQP) project was started in
2009 to organize a loosely-related set of concepts and source code on
the topic of soil profile visualization, aggregation, and classification
into this package (aqp). Over the past 8 years, the project has grown
into a suite of related R packages that enhance and simplify the
quantitative analysis of soil profile data. Central to the AQP project
is a new vocabulary of specialized functions and data structures that
can accommodate the inherent complexity of soil profile information;
freeing the scientist to focus on ideas rather than boilerplate data
processing tasks <doi:10.1016/j.cageo.2012.10.020>. These functions and
data structures have been extensively tested and documented, applied to
projects involving hundreds of thousands of soil profiles, and deeply
integrated into widely used tools such as SoilWeb
<https://casoilresource.lawr.ucdavis.edu/soilweb-apps>. Components of
the AQP project (aqp, soilDB, sharpshootR, soilReports packages) serve
an important role in routine data analysis within the USDA-NRCS Soil
Science Division. The AQP suite of R packages offer a convenient
platform for bridging the gap between pedometric theory and practice.

## Installation

Get the stable version from CRAN:

``` r
install.packages('aqp', dep=TRUE)
```

Get the development version from Github, after installing the CRAN
version + dependencies:

``` r
remotes::install_github("ncss-tech/aqp", dependencies=FALSE, upgrade=FALSE, build=FALSE)
```

Install suggested packages:

``` r
p <- c("colorspace", "ape", "soilDB", "latticeExtra", "tactile", "compositions", 
"sharpshootR", "markovchain", "xtable", "testthat", "Gmedian", 
"farver", "Hmisc", "tibble", "RColorBrewer", "scales", "digest", 
 "mpspline2", "soiltexture", "knitr", "rmarkdown", "mvtnorm")

install.packages(p)
```

## Website

<http://ncss-tech.github.io/AQP/>

## Examples

``` r
library(aqp)

# example data from three official series descriptions
data("osd")

# simulate 2 copies of each
# using horizon boundary distinctness offsets
set.seed(10101)
x <- perturb(osd, n = 2, boundary.attr = 'hzd', min.thickness = 5)

# tighter margins
par(mar = c(0, 0, 1, 0))

# adjust default style
# depict truncation at 175cm with ragged bottom
plotSPC(
  x, 
  name.style = 'center-center', 
  cex.names = 1,
  width = 0.33,
  cex.id = 0.9,
  hz.distinctness.offset = 'hzd', 
  max.depth = 175, 
  depth.axis = FALSE, 
  hz.depths = TRUE
)
```

![testing 1 2](reference/figures/README-unnamed-chunk-3-1.png)

## Citation

``` r
citation("aqp")
#> To cite aqp in publications use:
#> 
#>   Beaudette, D., Roudier, P., Brown, A. (2023). aqp: Algorithms for
#>   Quantitative Pedology. R package version 2.0.
#>   <https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=aqp>
#> 
#>   Beaudette, D.E., Roudier, P., O'Geen, A.T. Algorithms for
#>   quantitative pedology: A toolkit for soil scientists, Computers &
#>   Geosciences, Volume 52, March 2013, Pages 258-268, ISSN 0098-3004,
#>   http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.cageo.2012.10.020.
#> 
#> To see these entries in BibTeX format, use 'print(<citation>,
#> bibtex=TRUE)', 'toBibtex(.)', or set
#> 'options(citation.bibtex.max=999)'.
```

## Related Papers and Book Chapters

- Beaudette D.E., P. Roudier, and J. Skovlin. 2016. Probabilistic
  representation of genetic soil horizons. In Book Digital soil
  morphometrics. Springer.
- Maynard, J.J., S.W. Salley, D.E. Beaudette, and J.E. Herrick. 2020.
  Numerical soil classification supports soil identification by citizen
  scientists using limited, simple soil observations. Soil Science
  Society of America Journal 84:1675-1692.
- Beaudette, D. E., J. Skovlin, A. G. Brown, P. Roudier, and S. M.
  Roecker. “Algorithms for Quantitative Pedology.” In Geopedology,
  edited by Joseph Alfred Zinck, Graciela Metternicht, Héctor Francisco
  del Valle, and Marcos Angelini, 201–22. Cham: Springer International
  Publishing, 2023. <https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-031-20667-2_11>.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`GHL(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/GHL.md)
  [`` `GHL<-`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/GHL.md)
  : Get or Set Generalized Horizon Label (GHL) Column Name

- [`HzDepthLogicSubset()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/HzDepthLogicSubset.md)
  :

  Subset `SoilProfileCollection` Objects or Horizons via
  `checkHzDepthLogic`

- [`L1_profiles()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/L1_profiles.md)
  : Create Representative Soil Profiles via L1 Estimator

- [`NCSP()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/NCSP.md) :
  Numerical Classification of Soil Profiles

- [`ROSETTA.centroids`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/ROSETTA.centroids.md)
  : Average Hydraulic Parameters from the ROSETTA Model by USDA Soil
  Texture Class

- [`SANN_1D()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/SANN_1D.md) :
  Fix Overlap within a Sequence via Simulated Annealing

- [`SPC.with.overlap`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/SPC.with.overlap.md)
  : Example SoilProfileCollection with Overlapping Horizons

- [`SoilProfileCollection()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/SoilProfileCollection-class.md)
  : An S4 object representation of a group of soil profiles.

- [`prj(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/SoilProfileCollection-crs.md)
  [`` `prj<-`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/SoilProfileCollection-crs.md)
  [`proj4string(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/SoilProfileCollection-crs.md)
  [`` `proj4string<-`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/SoilProfileCollection-crs.md)
  : Get or Set Coordinate Reference System for SoilProfileCollection

- [`plotSPC()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/SoilProfileCollection-plotting-methods.md)
  [`plot(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/SoilProfileCollection-plotting-methods.md)
  : Create Soil Profile Sketches

- [`SoilTextureLevels()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/SoilTextureLevels.md)
  : Ranking Systems for USDA Soil Texture Classes

- [`accumulateDepths()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/accumulateDepths.md)
  : Accumulate horizon depths, and reflect reversed depths, relative to
  new datum

- [`addBracket()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/addBracket.md)
  : Add Depth Brackets

- [`addDiagnosticBracket()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/addDiagnosticBracket.md)
  : Annotate Diagnostic Features

- [`addVolumeFraction()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/addVolumeFraction.md)
  : Symbolize Volume Fraction within a Soil Profile Collection Plot

- [`aggregateColor()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/aggregateColor.md)
  : Summarize Soil Colors

- [`aggregateColorPlot()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/aggregateColorPlot.md)
  : Plot aggregate soil color data

- [`aggregateSoilDepth()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/aggregateSoilDepth.md)
  : Probabilistic Estimation of Soil Depth within Groups

- [`alignTransect()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/alignTransect.md)
  : Calculate Relative Positions from Transect Data

- [`allocate()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/allocate.md)
  : Allocate soil properties within various classification systems.

- [`aqp-package`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/aqp-package.md)
  [`aqp`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/aqp-package.md)
  [`aqp.env`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/aqp-package.md)
  : Algorithms for Quantitative Pedology

- [`aqp_df_class(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/aqp_df_class.md)
  [`` `aqp_df_class<-`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/aqp_df_class.md)
  : Get aqp_df_class entry from metadata or return a safe value.

- [`argillic.clay.increase.depth()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/argillic.clay.increase.depth.md)
  : Return upper boundary of argillic horizon

- [`barron.torrent.redness.LAB()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/barron.torrent.redness.LAB.md)
  : Barron & Torrent (1986) Redness Index in LAB color space

- [`bootstrapSoilTexture()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/bootstrapSoilTexture.md)
  : Bootstrap Soil Texture Data

- [`brierScore()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/brierScore.md)
  : Multinominal Brier Score

- [`buntley.westin.index()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/buntley.westin.index.md)
  : Buntley-Westin (1965) Index

- [`ca630`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/ca630.md) : Soil
  Data from the Central Sierra Nevada Region of California

- [`checkHzDepthLogic()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/checkHzDepthLogic.md)
  : Check a SoilProfileCollection object for errors in horizon depths.

- [`checkSPC()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/checkSPC.md)
  :

  Test for a valid `SoilProfileCollection`

- [`as.data.frame(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/coercion-methods.md)
  :

  Coerce SoilProfileCollection with
  [`as()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/coercion-methods.md)

- [`col2Munsell()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/col2Munsell.md)
  : Convert colors into Munsell Notation

- [`collapseHz()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/collapseHz.md)
  : Collapse Horizons within Profiles Based on Pattern Matching

- [`colorChart()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/colorChart.md)
  : Visualize soil colors in Munsell notation according to within-group
  frequency.

- [`colorContrast()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/colorContrast.md)
  : Metrics of Contrast Suitable for Comparing Soil Colors

- [`colorContrastPlot()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/colorContrastPlot.md)
  : Color Contrast Plot

- [`colorQuantiles()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/colorQuantiles.md)
  : Soil Color Range via Quantiles

- [`c(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/combine-SoilProfileCollection-method.md)
  [`combine(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/combine-SoilProfileCollection-method.md)
  [`combine(`*`<list>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/combine-SoilProfileCollection-method.md)
  : Combine SoilProfileCollection objects

- [`compareSites()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/compareSites.md)
  : Compare Site Level Attributes of a SoilProfileCollection

- [`compositeSPC()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/compositeSPC.md)
  : Return a list representation of site and horizon level data

- [`confusionIndex()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/confusionIndex.md)
  : Confusion Index

- [`contrastChart()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/contrastChart.md)
  : Color Contrast Chart

- [`contrastClass()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/contrastClass.md)
  : Soil Color Contrast

- [`correctAWC()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/correctAWC.md)
  : Apply rock fragment or salt correction to available water content

- [`crit.clay.argillic()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/crit.clay.argillic.md)
  : Determines threshold (minimum) clay content for argillic upper bound

- [`denormalize()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/denormalize.md)
  : Create a (redundant) horizon-level attribute from a site-level
  attribute

- [`depthOf()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/depthOf.md)
  [`maxDepthOf()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/depthOf.md)
  [`minDepthOf()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/depthOf.md)
  : Get top or bottom depths of horizons matching a regular expression
  pattern

- [`depthWeights()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/depthWeights.md)
  : Return a vector of contributing fractions over a depth interval

- [`depth_units(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/depth_units.md)
  [`` `depth_units<-`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/depth_units.md)
  : Get depth units from metadata

- [`depths(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/depths.md)
  [`` `depths<-`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/depths.md)
  [`` `depths<-`( ``*`<data.frame>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/depths.md)
  : Initialize a SoilProfileCollection from data.frame

- [`diagnostic_hz(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/diagnostic_hz.md)
  [`` `diagnostic_hz<-`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/diagnostic_hz.md)
  : Get or Set Diagnostic Horizon data in a SoilProfileCollection

- [`dice(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/dice-SoilProfileCollection-method.md)
  :

  Efficient Slicing of `SoilProfileCollection` Objects

- [`` `$<-`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/dollarsign-set.md)
  : Set data in column of horizon or site data in a
  SoilProfileCollection

- [`` `$`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/dollarsign.md)
  : Get data from column of horizon or site data in a
  SoilProfileCollection

- [`` `[[<-`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/doublebracket-set.md)
  : Add or change column of horizon or site data in a
  SoilProfileCollection

- [`` `[[`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/doublebracket.md)
  : Get column of horizon or site data in a SoilProfileCollection

- [`duplicate()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/duplicate.md)
  : Duplicate Profiles of a SoilProfileCollection

- [`electroStatics_1D()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/electroStatics_1D.md)
  : Label placement based on a simulation of electrostatic forces

- [`equivalentMunsellChips()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/equivalentMunsellChips.md)
  : Identify "equivalent" (whole number value/chroma) Munsell chips

- [`equivalent_munsell`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/equivalent_munsell.md)
  :

  Indices of "equivalent" Munsell chips in the `munsell` data set

- [`estimateAWC()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/estimateAWC.md)
  : Estimate available water capacity for fine-earth fraction

- [`estimatePSCS()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/estimatePSCS.md)
  : Estimate boundaries of the U.S Soil Taxonomy Particle Size Control
  Section

- [`estimateSoilColor()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/estimateSoilColor.md)
  : Estimate dry soil colors from moist soil colors and vice versa.

- [`estimateSoilDepth()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/estimateSoilDepth.md)
  : Estimate Soil Depth

- [`evalGenHZ()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/evalGenHZ.md)
  : Evaluate Generalized Horizon Labels

- [`evalMissingData()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/evalMissingData.md)
  : Evaluate Missing Data within a SoilProfileCollection

- [`explainPlotSPC()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/explainPlotSPC.md)
  :

  Visual Explanation for `plotSPC`

- [`fillHzGaps()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/fillHzGaps.md)
  : Find and Fill Horizon Gaps

- [`fixOverlap()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/fixOverlap.md)
  : Fix Overlap within a Sequence

- [`flagOverlappingHz()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/flagOverlappingHz.md)
  : Flag perfectly overlapping horizons within a SoilProfileCollection

- [`fragmentClasses()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/fragmentClasses.md)
  : Coarse Fragment Class Labels and Diameter

- [`fragmentSieve()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/fragmentSieve.md)
  : Sieve the Coarse Fraction of Soil

- [`genSlabLabels()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/genSlabLabels.md)
  : Generate Labels for Slabs

- [`generalize.hz()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/generalize.hz.md)
  [`generalizeHz(`*`<character>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/generalize.hz.md)
  [`generalizeHz(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/generalize.hz.md)
  : Generalize Horizon Names

- [`genhzTableToAdjMat()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/genhzTableToAdjMat.md)
  : Convert cross-tabulation to adjacency matrix.

- [`get.increase.matrix()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/get.increase.matrix.md)
  [`get.increase.depths()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/get.increase.matrix.md)
  : Compute Pair-wise Distances of Soil Properties over Depth

- [`get.ml.hz()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/get.ml.hz.md)
  : Determine ML Horizon Boundaries

- [`getArgillicBounds()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/getArgillicBounds.md)
  : Estimate upper and lower boundary of argillic diagnostic subsurface
  horizon

- [`getCambicBounds()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/getCambicBounds.md)
  : Find all intervals that are potentially part of a Cambic horizon

- [`getClosestMunsellChip()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/getClosestMunsellChip.md)
  : Get Approximate Munsell Chip

- [`getLastHorizonID()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/getLastHorizonID.md)
  : Get IDs of Deepest Horizons by Profile

- [`getSoilDepthClass()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/getSoilDepthClass.md)
  : Generate Soil Depth Class Matrix

- [`getSurfaceHorizonDepth()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/getSurfaceHorizonDepth.md)
  [`getMineralSoilSurfaceDepth()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/getSurfaceHorizonDepth.md)
  [`getPlowLayerDepth()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/getSurfaceHorizonDepth.md)
  : Determine thickness of horizons (continuous from surface) matching a
  pattern

- [`glom(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/glom.md)
  [`trunc(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/glom.md)
  : Subset soil horizon data using a depth or depth interval

- [`glomApply()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/glomApply.md)
  : Subset an SPC by applying glom to each profile

- [`grepSPC()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/grepSPC.md) :
  Subset SPC with pattern-matching for text-based attributes

- [`groupSPC()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/groupSPC.md)
  : Store groupings within a profile collection.

- [`groupedProfilePlot()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/groupedProfilePlot.md)
  : Grouped Soil Profile Plot

- [`guessGenHzLevels()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/guessGenHzLevels.md)
  : Guess Appropriate Ordering for Generalized Horizon Labels

- [`guessHzAttrName()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/guessHzAttrName.md)
  [`guessHzDesgnName()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/guessHzAttrName.md)
  [`guessHzTexClName()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/guessHzAttrName.md)
  : Guess Horizon Slot Column Names

- [`harden.melanization()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/harden.melanization.md)
  : Harden (1982) Melanization

- [`harden.rubification()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/harden.rubification.md)
  : Harden (1982) Rubification

- [`harmonize(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/harmonize-SoilProfileCollection-method.md)
  : Harmonize a property by profile-level denormalization for convenient
  visualization or analysis of ranges

- [`hasDarkColors()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hasDarkColors.md)
  : Find horizons with colors darker than a Munsell hue, value, chroma
  threshold

- [`horizonColorIndices()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/horizonColorIndices.md)
  : Horizon Color Indices

- [`` `horizonDepths<-`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/horizonDepths.md)
  [`horizonDepths(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/horizonDepths.md)
  : Set horizon depth column names

- [`` `horizonNames<-`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/horizonNames.md)
  [`horizonNames(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/horizonNames.md)
  : Set horizon column names

- [`horizons(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/horizons.md)
  [`` `horizons<-`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/horizons.md)
  : Retrieve horizon data from SoilProfileCollection

- [`huePosition()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/huePosition.md)
  : Munsell Hue Reference and Position Searching

- [`huePositionCircle()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/huePositionCircle.md)
  : Visual Description of Munsell Hue Ordering

- [`hurst.redness()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hurst.redness.md)
  : Hurst (1977) Redness Index

- [`hzDepthTests()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hzDepthTests.md)
  : Tests of horizon depth logic

- [`hzDesgn(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hzDesgn.md)
  : Get horizon designation column name

- [`hzDistinctnessCodeToOffset()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hzDistinctnessCodeToOffset.md)
  : Convert Horizon Boundary Distinctness to Vertical Offset

- [`` `hzID<-`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hzID.md)
  [`hzID(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hzID.md)
  : Set horizon IDs

- [`hzMetadata(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hzMetadata.md)
  : Get horizon-level metadata

- [`hzAbove()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hzOffset.md)
  [`hzBelow()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hzOffset.md)
  [`hzOffset()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hzOffset.md)
  : Horizons Above or Below

- [`hzTopographyCodeToLineType()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hzTopographyCodeToLineType.md)
  : Convert Horizon Boundary Topography to Line Type

- [`hzTopographyCodeToOffset()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hzTopographyCodeToOffset.md)
  : Convert Horizon Boundary Topography to Vertical Offset

- [`hzTransitionProbabilities()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hzTransitionProbabilities.md)
  [`mostLikelyHzSequence()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hzTransitionProbabilities.md)
  : Horizon Transition Probabilities

- [`hz_dissolve()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hz_dissolve.md)
  [`dissolve_hz()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hz_dissolve.md)
  : Dissolving horizon boundaries by grouping variables

- [`hz_intersect()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hz_intersect.md)
  : Intersecting horizon boundaries by horizon depths

- [`hz_lag()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hz_lag.md) :
  Find lagged horizon values

- [`hz_segment()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hz_segment.md)
  [`segment()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hz_segment.md)
  : Segmenting of Soil Horizon Data by Depth Interval

- [`hz_to_taxpartsize()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hz_to_taxpartsize.md)
  : Allocate Particle Size Class for the Control Section.

- [`hzdesgnname(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hzdesgnname.md)
  [`` `hzdesgnname<-`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hzdesgnname.md)
  : Get or Set Horizon Designation Column Name

- [`` `hzidname<-`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hzidname.md)
  [`hzidname(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/hzidname.md)
  : Set horizon ID column name

  : Get or Set Horizon Texture Class Column Name

  : Get profile ID column name

- [`` `initSpatial<-`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/initSpatial.md)
  [`` `initSpatial<-`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`,`*`<character>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/initSpatial.md)
  [`getSpatial(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/initSpatial.md)

  : Initialize Spatial Data in a SoilProfileCollection

- [`invertLabelColor()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/invertLabelColor.md)
  : Make High Contrast Label Colors

- [`isEmpty(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/isEmpty.md)
  : Check for "empty" profiles in a SoilProfileCollection

  : Soil Morphologic Data from Jacobs et al. 2002.

- [`length(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/length.md)
  : Get the number of profiles in a SoilProfileCollection

- [`lookup_taxpartsize()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/lookup_taxpartsize.md)
  : Ranking Systems for USDA Taxonomic Particle-Size and Substitute
  Classes of Mineral Soils

- [`lunique()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/lunique.md) :
  Eliminate duplicate instances of profile IDs in a list of
  SoilProfileCollections

- [`max(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/max.md)
  : Get the maximum bottom depth in a SoilProfileCollection

- [`metadata(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/metadata.md)
  [`` `metadata<-`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/metadata.md)
  : Retrieve metadata from SoilProfileCollection

- [`min(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/min.md)
  : Get the minimum bottom depth in a SoilProfileCollection

- [`missingDataGrid()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/missingDataGrid.md)
  : Missing Data Grid

- [`mixMunsell()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/mixMunsell.md)
  : Mix Munsell Colors via Spectral Library

- [`mollic.thickness.requirement()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/mollic.thickness.requirement.md)
  : Calculate the minimum thickness requirement for Mollic epipedon

- [`mu_confusion_matrix()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/mu_confusion_matrix.md)
  : Map unit confusion matrix and other classification measures

- [`munsell`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/munsell.md) :
  Munsell to sRGB Lookup Table for Common Soil Colors

- [`munsell.spectra`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/munsell.spectra.md)
  : Spectral Library of Munsell Colors

- [`munsell2rgb()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/munsell2rgb.md)
  : Convert Munsell Color Notation to other Color Space Coordinates
  (sRGB and CIELAB)

- [`munsell2spc(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/munsell2spc-SoilProfileCollection-method.md)
  : Merge Munsell Hue, Value, Chroma converted to sRGB & CIELAB into a
  SoilProfileCollection

- [`munsellHuePosition`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/munsellHuePosition.md)
  : Munsell Hue Position Reference

- [`mutate_profile()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/mutate_profile.md)
  [`mutate_profile_raw()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/mutate_profile.md)
  : Transform a SPC (by profile) with a set of expressions

  : Get names of columns in site and horizons table

- [`nrow(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/nrow.md)
  : Get the number of horizons in a SoilProfileCollection

  Output from soilDB::fetchOSD()

  [`overlapMetrics()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/overlapMetrics.md)
  : Find Overlap within a Sequence

  [`prepanel.depth_function()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/panel.depth_function.md)
  : Lattice Panel Function for Soil Profiles

  : Parse Munsell Color Notation

- [`pbindlist()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/pbindlist.md)
  : Combine a list of SoilProfileCollection objects

- [`perturb()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/perturb.md) :
  Perturb soil horizon depths using boundary distinctness

- [`plotColorMixture()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/plotColorMixture.md)
  : Visualize Spectral Mixing of Munsell Colors

- [`plotColorQuantiles()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/plotColorQuantiles.md)
  : Visualize Color Quantiles

  :

  Plot Multiple `SoilProfileCollection` Objects

- [`plotProfileDendrogram()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/plotProfileDendrogram.md)
  : Plot soil profiles below a dendrogram

- [`plot_distance_graph()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/plot_distance_graph.md)
  : Between Individual Distance Plot

- [`previewColors()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/previewColors.md)
  : Preview Colors

  : Iterate over profiles in a SoilProfileCollection

  : Soil Profile Group Labels

  : Soil Profile Information Index

  [`profile_id(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/profile_id.md)
  : Set profile IDs

  : Quickly Assemble a SoilProfileCollection

- [`random_profile()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/random_profile.md)
  : Random Profile

- [`ph_to_rxnclass()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/reaction.md)
  [`rxnclass_to_ph()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/reaction.md)
  [`ReactionClassLevels()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/reaction.md)
  : Convert pH to/from Reaction Classes

- [`reactionclass`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/reactionclass.md)
  : pH Reaction Classes

- [`rebuildSPC()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/rebuildSPC.md)
  : Rebuild a SoilProfileCollection object

- [`reduceSPC()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/reduceSPC.md)
  : Select a subset of columns from a SoilProfileCollection

  : Re-order corrupted horizon data

- [`repairMissingHzDepths()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/repairMissingHzDepths.md)
  : Repair Problematic Lower Horizon Depths

- [`` `replaceHorizons<-`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/replaceHorizons.md)
  : Replace Data in Horizon Slot

  [`` `restrictions<-`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/restrictions.md)
  : Get or Set Restriction data in a SoilProfileCollection

- [`rgb2munsell()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/rgb2munsell.md)
  : sRGB to Munsell Color Conversion

- [`rowley2019`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/rowley2019.md)
  : Soil Morphologic, Geochemical, and Mineralogy Data from Rowley et
  al. 2019.

- [`rp()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/rp.md) :

  Generate a `SoilProfileCollection` of random profiles

- [`shannonEntropy()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/shannonEntropy.md)
  : Shannon Entropy

- [`sierraTransect`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/sierraTransect.md)
  : Soil Physical and Chemical Data Related to Studies in the Sierra
  Nevada Mountains, CA, USA.

- [`sim()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/sim.md) :
  DEPRECATED Simulate Soil Profiles

- [`simulateColor()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/simulateColor.md)
  : Simulate Soil Colors

- [`` `[`( ``*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/singlebracket.md)
  : Matrix/data.frame-like access to profiles and horizons in a
  SoilProfileCollection

- [`site(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/site.md)
  [`` `site<-`() ``](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/site.md)
  : Retrieve site data from SoilProfileCollection

  [`siteNames(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/siteNames.md)
  : Set site column names

  [`slab_function()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/slab.md)
  : Slab-Wise Aggregation of SoilProfileCollection Objects

- [`slice.fast()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/slice.md)
  [`slice(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/slice.md)
  [`get.slice()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/slice.md) :
  Slicing of SoilProfileCollection Objects

- [`slicedHSD()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/slicedHSD.md)
  : Tukey's HSD Over Slices

- [`soilColorSignature()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/soilColorSignature.md)
  : Soil Profile Color Signatures

- [`soilPalette()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/soilPalette.md)
  : Soil Color Palette

- [`soilTextureColorPal()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/soilTextureColorPal.md)
  : Soil Texture Color Palettes

- [`soil_minerals`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/soil_minerals.md)
  : Munsell Colors of Common Soil Minerals

- [`soiltexture`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/soiltexture.md)
  : Lookup tables for sand, silt, clay, texture class, and textural
  modifiers.

- [`sp1`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/sp1.md) : Soil
  Profile Data Example 1

- [`sp2`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/sp2.md) : Honcut
  Creek Soil Profile Data

- [`sp3`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/sp3.md) : Soil
  Profile Data Example 3

- [`sp4`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/sp4.md) : Soil
  Chemical Data from Serpentinitic Soils of California

- [`sp5`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/sp5.md) : Sample
  Soil Database \#5

- [`sp6`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/sp6.md) : Soil
  Physical and Chemical Data from Manganiferous Soils

- [`spc2mpspline(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/spc2mpspline-SoilProfileCollection-method.md)
  :

  SoilProfileCollection wrapper for
  [`mpspline2::mpspline()`](https://rdrr.io/pkg/mpspline2/man/mpspline.html)

- [`spc_in_sync()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/spc_in_sync.md)
  : Quickly assess relative state of site and horizon slots

- [`spec2Munsell()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/spec2Munsell.md)
  : Convert reflectance spectra to closest Munsell chip

- [`spectral.reference`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/spectral.reference.md)
  : Standard Illuminants and Observers

- [`split(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/split-SoilProfileCollection-method.md)
  : Split a SoilProfileCollection object into a list of
  SoilProfileCollection objects.

- [`splitLogicErrors()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/splitLogicErrors.md)
  :

  Split a `SoilProfileCollection` into a list based on types of horizon
  logic errors

- [`subApply()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/subApply.md)
  : Subset SPC based on result of performing function on each profile

- [`subset(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/subset-SoilProfileCollection-method.md)
  : Subset a SoilProfileCollection with logical expressions

- [`subsetHz(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/subsetHz-SoilProfileCollection-method.md)
  : Subset the horizons in a SoilProfileCollection using logical
  criteria

- [`subsetProfiles(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/subsetProfiles.md)
  : DEPRECATED use subset

- [`summarizeSPC()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/summarizeSPC.md)
  :

  Perform summaries on groups (from `group_by`) and create new site or
  horizon level attributes

- [`tauW()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/tauW.md)
  [`summaryTauW()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/tauW.md) :

  Compute weighted naive and *tau* statistics for a cross-classification
  matrix

- [`texcl_to_ssc()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/texture.md)
  [`ssc_to_texcl()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/texture.md)
  [`texmod_to_fragvoltot()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/texture.md)
  [`texture_to_taxpartsize()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/texture.md)
  [`texture_to_texmod()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/texture.md)
  [`fragvol_to_texmod()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/texture.md)
  : Textural conversions

- [`textureTriangleSummary()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/textureTriangleSummary.md)
  : Soil Texture Low-RV-High as Defined by Quantiles

- [`thicknessOf()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/thicknessOf.md)
  : Calculate Thickness of Horizons Matching Logical Criteria

- [`thompson.bell.darkness()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/thompson.bell.darkness.md)
  : Thompson-Bell (1996) Index

- [`traditionalColorNames`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/traditionalColorNames.md)
  : Traditional Soil Color Names

- [`transform(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/transform.md)
  : Transform a SPC with expressions based on site or horizon level
  attributes

- [`unique(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/unique.md)
  :

  Uniqueness within a `SoilProfileCollection` via MD5 Hash

- [`us.state.soils`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/us.state.soils.md)
  : US State Soils

- [`validSpatialData(`*`<SoilProfileCollection>`*`)`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/validSpatialData.md)
  : Check for valid spatial reference of profiles

- [`warpHorizons()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/warpHorizons.md)
  : Inflate / Deflate Horizon Thickness

- [`wilson2022`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/wilson2022.md)
  : Example Data from Wilson et al. 2022

- [`xtableTauW()`](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/reference/xtableTauW.md)
  : Format a LaTeX table with results

# Articles

### All vignettes

- [An Overview of the aqp
  Package](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/articles/aqp-overview.md):
- [Introduction to SoilProfileCollection
  Objects](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/articles/Introduction-to-SoilProfileCollection-Objects.md):
- [Overlapping
  Annotation](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/articles/label-placement.md):
- [Missing
  Data](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/articles/missing-data.md):
- [Munsell Color
  Conversion](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/articles/Munsell-color-conversion.md):
- [Numerical Classification of Soil
  Profiles](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/articles/NCSP.md):
- [What is new in aqp
  2.x?](https://ncss-tech.github.io/aqp/articles/new-in-aqp-2.md):
